languages.text: Отсюда и далее мы поведем рассказ, опираясь на то, что узнали от очевидцев — тех, кто сопровождал Лорд-капитана в путешествии по страшному кораблю.
From here on, we will relate the events based on what we have learned from witnesses — the people who accompanied the Lord Captain on the tour of the dread ship.
languages.original_text: Отсюда и далее мы поведем рассказ, опираясь на то, что узнали от очевидцев — тех, кто сопровождал Лорд-капитана в путешествии по страшному кораблю.

traits.locale_text: From here on, we will relate the events based on what we have learned from witnesses — the people who accompanied the Lord Captain on the tour of the dread ship.
From here on, we will relate the events based on what we have learned from witnesses — the people who accompanied the Lord Captain on the tour of the dread ship.
From here on, we will relate the events based on what we have learned from witnesses — the people who accompanied the Lord Captain on the tour of the dread ship.
From here on, we will relate the events based on what we have learned from witnesses — the people who accompanied the Lord Captain on the tour of the dread ship.

languages.text: De ahora en adelante, narraremos los hechos basándonos en lo que nos han contado numerosos testigos: la gente que acompañó a{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} en su visita a la temible nave.
languages.original_text: From here on, we will relate the events based on what we have learned from witnesses — the people who accompanied the Lord Captain on the tour of the dread ship.

traits.locale_text: De ahora en adelante, narraremos los hechos basándonos en lo que nos han contado numerosos testigos: la gente que acompañó a{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} en su visita a la temible nave.

languages.text: 从这里开始，我们将根据当时与舰长大人一起探索那艘恐怖飞船的证人们的证言，共同重现当时的情形。
languages.original_text: From here on, we will relate the events based on what we have learned from witnesses — the people who accompanied the Lord Captain on the tour of the dread ship.

traits.locale_text: 从这里开始，我们将根据当时与舰长大人一起探索那艘恐怖飞船的证人们的证言，共同重现当时的情形。

languages.text: ここからは目撃者、つまり恐ろしい船の冒険でロード・キャプテンに同行した人間から聞き取った内容を基に、この出来事を話していこう。
languages.original_text: From here on, we will relate the events based on what we have learned from witnesses — the people who accompanied the Lord Captain on the tour of the dread ship.

traits.locale_text: ここからは目撃者、つまり恐ろしい船の冒険でロード・キャプテンに同行した人間から聞き取った内容を基に、この出来事を話していこう。

languages.text: Ab hier werden wir die Ereignisse auf Basis von Zeugenaussagen berichten – von den Leuten, die den Lord Captain durch das grauenhafte Schiff begleitet haben.
languages.original_text: From here on, we will relate the events based on what we have learned from witnesses — the people who accompanied the Lord Captain on the tour of the dread ship.

traits.locale_text: Ab hier werden wir die Ereignisse auf Basis von Zeugenaussagen berichten – von den Leuten, die den Lord Captain durch das grauenhafte Schiff begleitet haben.

languages.text: À partir d'ici, nous exposerons les événements tels qu'ils nous furent relatés par les témoins, c'est-à-dire les personnes qui accompagnèrent {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} lors de l'exploration de l'épave.
languages.original_text: From here on, we will relate the events based on what we have learned from witnesses — the people who accompanied the Lord Captain on the tour of the dread ship.

traits.locale_text: À partir d'ici, nous exposerons les événements tels qu'ils nous furent relatés par les témoins, c'est-à-dire les personnes qui accompagnèrent {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} lors de l'exploration de l'épave.

languages.text: Buradan sonra görgü tanıklarından, yani korku gemisi gezisinde Lord Kaptan'a eşlik eden insanlardan duyduklarımızı anlatacağız.
languages.original_text: From here on, we will relate the events based on what we have learned from witnesses — the people who accompanied the Lord Captain on the tour of the dread ship.

traits.locale_text: Buradan sonra görgü tanıklarından duyduklarımızı anlatacağız. Korku gemisi gezisinde Lord Kaptan'a eşlik eden insanların hikâyesi bu.
